website_summaries.verdict: Provides a lot of ergonomic support, but most of it seems geared toward people of shorter stature.
pros: High mesh back with padded leather seat and head pillow
Controls to raise and lower seat, rock back, and change tilt tension
Offers good neck and lower back support
cons: The way the chair is designed means taller users may find it uncomfortable (lumbar support is off, armrests and headrest too low)
Some buyers claim the seat isn't very durable over time

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: We bought 4 of these for our office and everyone hates them. The seat is very uncomfortable, the chair creeks and cracks constantly, the armrest is not comfortable, the wheels don't all swivel together and one ends up dragging on our new wood floors, and they all feel like they are leaning in one direction or another. Really crap chairs. I wish we had kept our old chairs.
customer_reviews.author: Monika

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this chair
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this chair. I read soooooo many reviews on this and many other kinds of chairs. I decided on this one becuase it looked like it would be good for my lower back and that's what other reviewers said. It is! I am so happy with this chair and it was super easy to set up which was a big selling point for me. I don't have anything constructive or negative to say, I am very happy - I took a leap of faith buying this as I never sat on it before, but as I said before, very happy. btw - I am 5'6 if that's helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn K.

customer_reviews.title: 110lb and this chair is a good size for me
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'2" , 110lb and this chair is a good size for me. I was looking for a more ergonomic chair as I sit in front of my computer for most of the day, but a lot of the chairs I saw were much bigger than what I needed. First impressions, back support is noticeably better than my old cheap meshback chair, and the seat cushion is nice too. No tilting, but I didn't need it. There's a distinct plasticy smell, I think it's from the foam cushions but I'm sure it'll go away in a little bit. The chair wasn't hard to put together, the instructions were one straightforward page and extra screws were included.
customer_reviews.author: Susurrant

customer_reviews.title: Chair arrived very well packaged and was easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: I've been eyeing office chairs for long finally pulled the trigger. Chair arrived very well packaged and was easy to assemble. The chair is classic, comfortable and strong. The mesh back panel offers supreme comfort and makes an airy, breathable option and is comfortable for long hours of typing at a desk. It is highly useful to sit in a correct posture, and the cushion is firm without being overly hard. The back panel provides firm lumbar support and feels much sturdier than it looks, and it reclines with adjustable resistance. The headrest hits in the right position to allow my body to relax. Great chair for the price, Ergonomic with Great Design.
customer_reviews.author: Rishi

customer_reviews.title: Strong lumbar support.
customer_reviews.text: The chair was very simple to put together. It rocks either firmly or loosely, depending on how you set the knob. The seat is very comfortable. The reason this is only a 3 star for me is that the lumbar support was way to strong. People who like a strong lumbar support will love this, but I returned it because the lumbar support was too painful. The chair also doesn't stay reclined, which is something I like. The chair also arrived with a tear in the back but that isn't a big deal because if I had liked the chair, I'm sure they would have sent a replacement part.
customer_reviews.author: SeanPsyD

customer_reviews.title: it was cool and breathable
customer_reviews.text: A fashionable office chair. It's a reticulate chair, but it's very strong. When I found the chair, it was cool and breathable, and I thought there was no more heat. The height is adjustable, equipped with all the parts, tools and clear installation documents. It took me about 15 minutes to put it together. Very comfortable。 When I am working - give me good relaxation and additional support. It works very well. Strongly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: High Quality Mesh Chair
customer_reviews.text: First off, LCH is an amazing company. AMAZING customer support!!! If you enjoy lumbar support and you are not tall this chair will be your dream chair and you will most likely fall in love with it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: Wheels too loose, prone to failure
customer_reviews.text: Had this chair for 6 months now, the shaft on the wheels was not quite wide enough for the metal sleeve. The wheels now rattle furiously when the chair is moved, especially embarrassing in an office setting. The bearings in the wheels also have play in them; i ended up replacing the wheels, lets hope thats the end of it. Update Didn't fix the issue, now the base is creaking.
customer_reviews.author: STFBZero

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. There were parts missing and was too complex to set up. DO NOT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: saqib

customer_reviews.title: TRASH, do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Had the chair for 7 months and the center plate started cracking and finally completely broke, so the chair is going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Great chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair is great, love the lumbar and neck support! Will be ordering more soon. Good value for price. Helpful tip: my screws were located under seat cushion already screwed in (took me a second to figure out where they were)
customer_reviews.author: Kasey Lowrance

customer_reviews.title: I love this chair and I am a little picky about ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair and I am a little picky about a chair I am going to be sitting in her hours. It was easy to put together and is sturdy but not heavy. It is very comfortable and does not cause me back or shoulder strain. One of the wheels was not turning making the chair hard to move and would stick. I contacted the seller and a replacement wheel is on its way.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very Uncomfortable Lumbar support.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice tall back Sturdy overall Wheels roll nicely Cons: Barely any padding Arms are too low Lumbar support is not adjustable and non-removable and very uncomfortable, sticks out way too far. Unless you have a spine shaped like an "S" you won't like this chair.
customer_reviews.author: Boondocking Adventures dot com

customer_reviews.title: Low quality
customer_reviews.text: Got two, both arrived damaged. The chair feels flimsy and it is awkward to sit in. Spare the extra expense and get something that is better quality.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Small, Uncomfortable and Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Cons - This chair is meant for very small individuals. I am 5'10 male and the "headrest" does not reach the start of my neck. The next problem is the lumbar support is very grabby on clothing and will untuck your shirt in a matter of minutes. If you were wearing a dress I can't even imagine the nightmare this would cause. I don't think the padding in the seat is substantial enough and is uncomfortable after 45 minutes of sitting. Pro (1) - Very easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: TeJou

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: I don't compare it to those pricy office chairs because it is not fair. I compare it to the same price my old ikea office chair. This one is away much better. It's very sturdy and it gives support on the neck. The wheels are very smooth. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Pizzaheart

customer_reviews.title: Great chair .
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair a few weeks ago and very happy with my chair , installation took about 10 minutes without any problems . Assembly tools and all instruction was in the box took me 10 min to assemble . I spend about 6 to 8 hours daily sitting on this chair. So far, it is very comfortable breathable mesh back and padded leather seat and head pillow make it more relax able for my back , neck and shoulders . No problem to move on carpet .
customer_reviews.author: Reha

customer_reviews.title: Maybe my best Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I love my chair! All the adjustments you can make allow me to be quite comfortable for hours. I had back problems with my dining room chair with a cushion, so this really helps. Also, I had planned to buy a floor protector for my hardwood floors, but the rollers on this chair don't seem to hurt the floor at all. Also, the price for this chair, Amazing Amazon! Postscript: my back (I have had lower back problems for years) hasn't bothered me since. Maybe my best Amazon purchase!
customer_reviews.author: sean chen

customer_reviews.title: cylinder leaks
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this a couple months ago to replace my old chair. I put it together without issue. I adjusted the height to the max height for my comfort. About 3 weeks ago I noticed that the chair started reducing my setting slowly until I was at the lowest setting. I would raise it back up via the lever on the right hand side but it continues to let me down. Pun intended. While it is comfortable the ups and downs of the chair is frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: I love this chair. I needed to replace my old office chair as it was no longer comfortable and the rollers were worn out! This one arrived and it was super easy to put together, even by myself! It's extremely comfortable, in both the seat and the back. I had back pain from my last chair and this one has solved it. It's a very inexpensive choice and highly worth it.
customer_reviews.author: halah

customer_reviews.title: comfortable; easy assembly; seems sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what you'd expect for an office chair. It's on the lighter side, but seems to be as sturdy as any other office chair. It's super comfortable with some back rock and a neck cushion at the perfect height for someone 5'8 or 5'10 and slouching. Adjustable height and arms. Wheels and rotates freely as expected. Took about 30min to unpack and assemble with no rush or prior experience.
customer_reviews.author: Zaz Brown

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable office chair
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable office chair with decent back support and a nice padded bottom cushion. Adjustable heights for the seat and also for armrests. Also has built-in lumbar support. The bottom wheels allow the chair to roll around freely and smoothly. After 1 month of use, the chair is still holding up well and hasn't fallen apart like others.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Yay
customer_reviews.text: It has now been a few months and so far it’s a good chair! I’m in it for hours studying! My bum gets tired but it’s cushioned. I’m not sure if the reclining part locks. Haven’t figured it out but it does recline
customer_reviews.author: Diaz

customer_reviews.title: comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Chair was easy to assemble. Very versitile and stylish chair. The lumbar support, adjustable armrests, and head rest all make this a very comfortable and easy to use chair. It also looks very sleek and is breathable with the mesh back. The chrome legs look chic.
customer_reviews.author: zel

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair
customer_reviews.text: I like that this is actually a high back chair.. the last one I ordered from amazon was a few inches short. The arm rests are also adjustable which is good. This is the first mesh chair that I ever got since I usually get the cushion ones but this isnt bad. The seat itself is an inch or 2 smaller than the usual ones I get from staples/office depot though. So far so good.. easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Last 6 months
customer_reviews.text: This chair had great promise but didn't last more than 6 months. It's insane loud with any and all movement, it has an even louder thump if you try to lock it in place. I am so disheartened I went with this chair - KEEP ON LOOKING unless you like the annoying sounds of Snaps, Thumps, Pops, and Creaking. It says the chair has a "1-year warranty" but nothing is listed on how to contact the company.
customer_reviews.author: Cory N.

customer_reviews.title: easy to assemble. good design.
customer_reviews.text: This is a comfortable, light weight office chair with great features. It provides support and can be adjusted to several heights. It was very easy to assemble and appears to be well made and durable. I'm pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amzn Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slowly breaking apart...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this chair for a year and its become quite the piece of crap. At first the chair was very comfortable and I loved it. Within the first couple of months I was constantly fixing screws that would fall out (and still do to this day). Plastic parts that don't stay on. Seams on the back of chair have ripped open. The seat cushion is flat. The whole chair leans forward and to the side. It's quite noisy. I suppose that's what I get for buying a cheap chair.
customer_reviews.author: Staci Quaine

customer_reviews.title: So good.
customer_reviews.text: This is so comfortable, and so sturdy. I love they lower back support and the neck support. This is the first nice office chair I've ever bought, and I love it. Personally, I don't use the arm rests, so I threw them away.
customer_reviews.author: Brady

customer_reviews.title: Update: Chair broken after less than a year - Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for nearly a year. When it arrived, it was easy to assemble, but it leaned a bit to the left. OK. Now, the pneumatic chair height adjustment has failed. After writing the review, I was contacted by the seller. They were fantastic: excellent customer service. They offered to replace the chair or send me a refund for the chair. I opted for the refund, and it was promptly paid. Even though the chair did not work out for me, I would certainly recommend the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: ergonomically excellent
customer_reviews.text: i have the chair for some days and glad about what i bought, easy to put together and the seat is super comfortable, not too firm or too soft. and the height adjustment is greater for mu desk and typing situation, the armrests are nicely padded. i love the flip-up arms. the mesh is tough supportive and breathable. thank you and give 4-5 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. I used the pictures and ignored the instructions as they had the hardware numbered incorrectly. It all went together in about 20 minutes. Very comfortable chair.
customer_reviews.author: melanie1221

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomically Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: l had been looking for an ergonomic chair to replace my old one. After searching and reading a lot of reviews, l decided to give this chair a try. l had this chair for a week now and l’m really glad l purchased it. It’s easy to put together, took about 20 minutes once l had all the pieces out of the giant box. The seat is comfortable, not too firm and not too soft. And height adjustment is great for my desk and typing situation. The armrests are nicely padded. And also love the flip-up arms which me to stow closer in desk area. Moreover the mesh is tough supportive and breathable. Overall l’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Gou

customer_reviews.title: Ergonomically Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: l had been looking for an ergonomic chair to replace my old one. After searching and reading a lot of reviews, l decided to give this chair a try. l had this chair for a week now and l’m really glad l purchased it. It’s easy to put together, took about 20 minuets once l had all the pieces out of the giant box. The seat is comfortable, not too firm and not too soft. And height adjustment is great for my desk and typing situation. The armrests are nicely padded. And also love the flip-up arms which me to stow closer in desk area. Moreover the mesh is tough supportive and breathable. Overall l’m happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A pain to put together but great to sit in
customer_reviews.text: So far I’m loving this chair. Feels very sturdy and is very firm for my lower back. It took me about 45 minutes to put together. Some of it was a little frustrating, there was one screw on the armrest that I couldn’t get to tighten correctly no matter what I did. I also can’t figure out how to lower the chair, maybe I put it together wrong but I like mine on the highest setting so it won’t impact much for me. Love that the armrests are adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Pivoda

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair; the lumbar support is great for my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair; the lumbar support is great for my back, and the mesh helps air to circulate. My only complaint is that the seat cushion is not very comfortable. I have added my own cushion, and it enables me to work at my desk all day.
customer_reviews.author: Wiggy

customer_reviews.title: Item defective
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this chair for my home office at a second residence. Issues as new: the lumbar support is awkwardly placed and not ergonomic. The mechanism that stops the chair from leaning back is loose fitting allowing some play in the chair which upsets comfort of your posture. Issues after 1 year of use: The chair is no longer usable. The frame piece that attaches the legs to the chair has fractured, is no longer safe to sit in and presents a serious safety hazard. It does not appear there is an adequate return policy to cover this defect either.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Fedrizzi

customer_reviews.title: Seat is comfortable, but back covering hurts
customer_reviews.text: PROS: +Easy to assemble, and they give you a set of spares which is a good consideration. +The seat is pretty comfortable, and I like it a lot. +Mesh back and seat keep the chair cool CONS - The chair's balance is slightly off, so if you scoot forward too quickly, sometimes it tips forward. - The back covering is unbearable now because there is a leather lip in the middle of the chair that has curled downward. It pokes at my back and hurts a lot after a couple of minutes of sitting. I have to put a pillow to block it. This was a big minus for me.
customer_reviews.author: Beebee’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my boys while “gaming”. Only had them a couple of months but they’ve probably have gotten more use than I care to admit. They still look great and the kids haven’t complained about the chair hurting their backs!
customer_reviews.author: Ringo

customer_reviews.title: This is a great chair for shorter people
customer_reviews.text: This is a great chair for shorter people. Got these two chairs for the home office. Being taller 6 foot, the chair is low back but advertised as high back. Took the chairs to the office, the ladies in the office loved them. They fit them perfectly. A lady that is very pregnant loved the chair, said it took pressure off her back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this chair for about 6 months, maybe 3 hours/evening at home. The elevation cylinder (controlling seat height) is starting to fail already. And the seller is not willing to stand behind it. I guess you do not get what you do not pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Solomon

customer_reviews.title: This would be a great chair!
customer_reviews.text: It NEEDS arm padding!! this is a good chair except the arm pads are so hard! I bought some foam pads that strap on but it make the chair so tacky. I also wish the chair would go up another 1" or 2".
customer_reviews.author: Hellcatone#

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble , well made and good price .
customer_reviews.text: I brought this chair for son , he loves it . It was easy to assemble . It has a mash back panel that offer comfort , it has a lumbar support and neck support . It support 160 lb .
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: A decent chair at a decent price
customer_reviews.text: For the price this chair is OK. You get a decent chair if you do not spend a whole lot of time in in. It is easy to assemble and comes with all the tools necessary to do so. Some improves for the chair would be a more comfortable lumbar support. It feels like one bar that is there to help with lumbar which is not bad at first but after an hour it feels uncomfortable. The one thing I cannot get over is the fact that the chair is not level. When I am sitting in the chair it leans to the right and causes me back pain when I am at the desk for extended periods of time.
customer_reviews.author: Hansel122

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly lightweight and easy to assemble. Very breathable!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is very lightweight and breathable. The tall back and headrest are very comfortable and I've found myself falling asleep in this chair sometimes. It's very lightweight and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Saddle seat helps with my bad back and the mesh keeps you cool!
customer_reviews.text: I always had the leather one, so this time I decide to try something different, the mesh one. It didn’t take long time to put it together if you have done this before. Compare to the leather one, mesh chair is not as hot as the leather one, it feel cool from both back and the seat, I’m assuming this type of chair will be better for the people who has a back problem. The pneumatic control will allow you lay back down a little more than the normal chair. And the handle where you can put your hands are adjustable, you can adjust the handle right where you want them to be.
customer_reviews.author: Yutong

customer_reviews.title: Unsafe Chair
customer_reviews.text: This chair although comfortable, is unsafe on a tile floor. If one sits down only slightly forward of a fully seated position, the chair has a tendency to tip forward with a resulting fall to the floor. The base does not appear to be large enough to properly distribute the occupants weight. I have had it tip over twice and in deference to saving my back bone, I have to give up using in my office.
customer_reviews.author: Don Flood

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble and very comfortable. It provides good support for my mid/lower back. It feels like good quality but only time will tell.
customer_reviews.author: Brian A

customer_reviews.title: Honestly not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for $100 in 2017 and from my experiences with it now, it's honestly not worth the price. In my opinion, you might as well spend an extra couple hundred dollars on an actual quality office chair (I don't have one yet but am saving for it instead of buying moderately priced chairs). My main issues is that the padding is subpar and the chair arms are uncomfortable due to how short they are. Ok for college but be prepared to offload this to another undergrad when you're done.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Kim

customer_reviews.title: Poorly built
customer_reviews.text: I have had this chair for about 14 months and I use it daily. I have already had to replace the screws that hold the back onto the base of the chair. The back continues to bend to one side of the chair and is very wobbly. I am not a heavy person but I do use it daily and this chair is almost to the point where I am going to have to throw it out. The material and all has held up well but without the back holding tightly onto the base, its sort of useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Long

customer_reviews.title: It's only my 4th day using the chair and its already developed a bad squeak.
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 if the chair didn't squeak so much. It's only my 4th day using the chair and its already developed a bad squeak. Updated my review bc the chair has gotten so squeaky I am in the market for a new chair Update 10/20 Updating review to excellent customer service. Going to try a different chair of theirs. They truly care about service and doing a good job. I recommend the company
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice chair, not enough middle back support
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for more middle back support. Too difficult to return it. It's better to try in the store than guess. It is a sturdy chair and I like the arm adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: M Brady

customer_reviews.title: Good overall chair and excellent after sale service
customer_reviews.text: The chair has good quality and design but this is not a soft, cushion chair. If you are looking for a firm chair, this is great option. Customer service was exceptional in handling my questions and concerns.
customer_reviews.author: Cristiane S.

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after year of use
customer_reviews.text: Like previous reviewers mentioned, the center plate cracked and the chair fell apart. I am not a small person, (6 '2, 200lbs), but I am not abusing this chair. It is just poorly built.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Reddy

customer_reviews.title: Decent chair
customer_reviews.text: Nice inexpensive chair. Works well and all. Not as nice as my posturpedic chair but costs 1/4 as much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable chair
customer_reviews.text: This is the best office chair that I have ever purchased. It is so comfortable, the headrest is a big plus. The price is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: DeAnn Loy

customer_reviews.title: Not durable but customer service fixed it
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted 4 and a half months at my job before someone broke it. Very upsetting. This is the second chair I’ve bought that hasn’t even lasted 5 months. It started getting a side to side wobble where the piston connects to the chair and eventually failed completely. Update.. after talking to customer service they were glad to refund the purchase and apologized for the breaking of the chair. Upon inspection, it appears the metal sheared clean where the piston connects to the frame. Customer service was very helpful in resolving the issue.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Dosch

customer_reviews.title: Ver comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, can sit in it for hours without any issues
customer_reviews.author: Murali

customer_reviews.title: Love the high back and headrest
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this chair for my home office. It was promptly delivered. We were able to assemble without problems, however, we did have leftover screws😉.. I love the high back with headrest. Makes it easy to sit back comfortably while on calls. The adjustable arms are a plus while moving in and out from the desk. I recommend a floor pad if you have it on carpet. The chair makes a big difference for me tied to my computer all day because i work from home. 4 stars because I wish the back was more flexible when I lean back, sorta stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Riehl

customer_reviews.title: The chair we wanted
customer_reviews.text: This is the chair we wanted. It provides great support for both neck and waist. It's steady and good-looking. Also, easy to put together. Overall, we really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Pi lover

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Arrived in good condition and included everything I needed to install without extra tools. Even came with gloves so appreciate the thoughtfulness. Quite comfortable so far and haven’t noticed any issues.
customer_reviews.author: ann

customer_reviews.title: Good chair
customer_reviews.text: Good chair for the price, only down fall is lumbar support not adjustable
customer_reviews.author: you will get the facts

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable at all.
customer_reviews.text: It's too high and the back doesn't touch over all. When it's higher than your neck and the whole back is too straight, it makes not comfortable at all regardless what they say in the advertisement.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Recline feature broke in 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: This is was a comfortable chair until the recline feature broke after 3 weeks. It is now stuck in the full upright position. The lattitude from the recline feature enable the chair to give and take as I moved in it. Without it, it's no better than a kitchen chair with a cushion and wheels. Tried to find contact details for seller but no luck. Chair is now listed as unavailable so not sure a return is even possible.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Decent chair for the price. Easy to assemble, seems well-made, and it’s comfortable for me (6’3”, 250lb). Good height adjustment. This is not a $500 ergo chair, but for $100 it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: This is a really nice chair. It’s easy to put together and all ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice chair. It’s easy to put together and all the tools you need are provided. It’s lightweight but sturdy at the same time. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Angelo

customer_reviews.title: Update
customer_reviews.text: I initially had an issue with the chair. However, their customer service has been excellent. They were able to resolve my issue. They truly stand behind the quality of their product
customer_reviews.author: Lisabella87

customer_reviews.title: No adjustable armrest
customer_reviews.text: Just realized this months later when i got a new desk. Mine apparently has no adjustable armrests. I have to detach them to be able to fit this with my new desk.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan Huerta

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chair a year and a half ago. It has been a comfortable chair up until recently. It seems to be leaning to one side and now it seems to be leaning forward when you sit in it. I really like this chair, but I think it should have lasted longer than a year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: JJ from LA

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super comfortable. I work from home and I have to sit for long periods of time, so I needed a chair that prevented me from getting back pain. This definitely does the job. Assembling it was incredibly easy. Everything was included, even protective gloves for my delicate hands!... Definitely worth what I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Toni

customer_reviews.title: Sleek and comfy but wasn't built to last.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gaming chair two years ago and was quite happy with it up until the metal plate beneath the seat that connects it to the hydraulic post/wheels started to fail. Took a couple days for the seat to completely separate. Pro tip: If this happens to you, chuck the hydraulic post/wheels and use the seat as a floor gaming chair.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Hormigoso

customer_reviews.title: Love these chairs !!!
customer_reviews.text: Just bought a second one for my wife , she loves it as well. So worth the money with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: scott's buy

customer_reviews.title: Great chair, questionable long-term durability
customer_reviews.text: Update: I was right. Lasted two years then broke. Comfortable. My boyfriend had no problems assembling. The only drawback I can see is that it feels like it isn't super-durable so likely isn't going to last for many years with heavy use like my last office chair did.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Clinebell

customer_reviews.title: This office chair is very comfortable to sit on
customer_reviews.text: This office chair is very comfortable to sit on. I like it very much. I bought two of them. I strongly recommended this chair. I would buy this for my family members if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Grace T.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable Desk Chair.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty comfortable chair and good quality for the price. It took longer to unpackage the parts than it did to assemble the chair! The bubble packs that held the bolts, etc., did not match the Part Numbers on the Instruction Sheet.
customer_reviews.author: John V Konior

customer_reviews.title: Welds broke after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, inexpensive and easy to assemble. Just didn't last long, welds on the bottom of the chair broke after 6 months. Now I am looking for a new chair again.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Lipe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Ergonomic Chair
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He hates putting items together but said this one was relatively easy. He likes it, provides good lumbar support and he's in it for like 5 hrs at a time.
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Menk

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to like it, but didn't
customer_reviews.text: The back support is not good, it is not sturdy and leans back too far. There is no way to tighten it or move the back support further in. Unfortunately I would not re-purchase.
customer_reviews.author: neslin

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Great chair, for the price you can't beat this deal
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this one
customer_reviews.text: Horrible back support. Doesn't like to stay in place. It's a disaster. Probably better to sit on 5 gallon bucket.
customer_reviews.author: Micah

customer_reviews.title: Good support for neck
customer_reviews.text: Good support for neck. Very light so moves around easily. Mesh provides enough air flow to keep you cool. Not as much adjust ability in terms of moving up and down.
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't think I was going to like it because the seat felt somewhat hard to the touch, but it is super comfortable...and I sit for long periods of time at work.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Not difficult to put together, is comfortable and attractive to look at. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The back being tall and a low chair. It was
customer_reviews.text: Came damaged the material but we did reach a fair agreement of a discount and they were very nice and timely about the matter. No complaints. Some times it just happens.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality
customer_reviews.text: Less than 5 months after purchasing, the back of this chair began began to bend. It is at the point where you fear that leaning back will break the back completely. Horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Relatively easy to set up. Can be slightly noisy when leaning back, but I haven't found one yet that isn't.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: This chair is worth every penny... all pieces were individually wrapped for shipping and went together incredibly easily.. this set up even came with gloves which I think I'll actually use for other projects as well
customer_reviews.author: Sondra Sierens

customer_reviews.title: ... through three chairs and finally found one that I liked! Easy to put together and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've been through three chairs and finally found one that I liked! Easy to put together and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David Albers

customer_reviews.title: I needed two of these I go after another one what a great chair easy to put together thank you in
customer_reviews.text: I found the instructions to be quite and in order . I needed two of these I go after another one what a great chair easy to put together thank you in Amazon
customer_reviews.author: ruru0888

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but SQUEAKY!
customer_reviews.text: Chair is okay as far as comfort goes. But it squeaks and drives me crazy! I have sprayed it like crazy with WD-40 and it still squeaks.
customer_reviews.author: Shellwvu

customer_reviews.title: Cofortable and priced right
customer_reviews.text: Good for perfect posture to aid in avoiding back aches. Could be a little better padded, but well worth the cost.
customer_reviews.author: tommie tucker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The directions were very basic and I don't think it came with the proper amount of screws. Update: After using the chait for a while it much more comfortable than many other chairs I've owned and it's half the price!!! :D
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Great chair - but only for a few years - heavy wear and tear
customer_reviews.text: Broke and had to toss it after 3 years. It was great for the first two and went downhill quickly after that. Not bad for $150
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky, uncomfortable, and largely unadjustable armrests that dont move
customer_reviews.text: Very uncomfortable and squeaky. Chair is loose internally and unable to tighten the screws so it keeps making squeaky noises. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS. I wish I could get a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Noor

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. It is surprisingly comfortable for and office chair. It gently reclines and is a simple solid design. Just make sure to tighten all the bolts well.
customer_reviews.author: Razor9

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great office chair. Good back support, comfortable seat and very easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kourtney M. Mccloskey

customer_reviews.title: Love the lumbar support
customer_reviews.text: This chair is super comfortable and has great lumbar support. As a person with herniated discs I find this is a huge help to maintaining posture. I might just order another of these.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Good, solid office chair
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a home office. Looks and functionality are very good. Very sturdy and assembley was simple. Took me about 10 minutes to unbox and assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Doug N

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the chair in the high position,like the adjustable arm rests,very mobile.
customer_reviews.author: barbaran sauer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: . Very easy to put together. Shipping to me was very fast. Chair looks very good and well put together. No problems with chair construction.
customer_reviews.author: GDW

product_meta.title: KADIRYA Mesh Office Chair High-Back PU Leather Home Computer Desk Chair Executive Ergonomic Swivel Chair Padded Headrest Lumbar Support Adjustable Arms(Black)
feature_bullets: Mesh leather Office chair: ergonomic high back office chair with a breathable mesh Back and padded leather seat and head pillow, sit relaxed in a thoughtfully designed desk chair that adjusts according to your needs

Synchro tilt tension control: simple pneumatic controls let you raise or lower your seat and rock back in your chair. Pulling out the handled right side of chair) to tilt back, push in to stop tilt. Awesome tilt tension knob underneath the seat controls the rate and ease of recline
Built in lumbar support: large openings of mesh back create optimal breathability for better ventilation. Embedded in leather padded back support gives additional support to the lumbar area

Solid construction: 360-degree swivel, heavy-duty nylon base and nylon smooth-rolling casters for great stability and mobility. Bifma Certification, more reliable and sturdy, maximum capacity up to 250 lbs.
Risk free purchase: easy assembly upon Arrival, please search "lch 2001" On YouTube. Give it a chance, you will have a better life!!!
